sentences.sContent: I completely forgot that it’s his birthday today.
sentences.sCn: 我完全忘了今天是他的生日。

sentences.sContent: He had never completely recovered from his illness.
sentences.sCn: 他病后一直没有完全康复。

sentences.sContent: a completely new range of low-cost computers
Portuguese is pronounced completely differently from Spanish.
sentences.sCn: 葡萄牙语的发音和西班牙语的完全不同。

sentences.sContent: ...who put herself through the fire of change to completely reinvent herself...
...it may be difficult to completely eliminate bias...
...or an 11-year-old completely absorbed in a fascinating comic strip...
...Piedmont's character has been completely bound up with the Westvaco paper mill: its prosperous past and doubtful future...
...This crazy bus schedule has got me completely confused...

words.tran: 完整；完全；完成；圆满；结束
